profilCorePeriph

Class ProfilCorePeriph

  • java.lang.Object
    • profilCorePeriph.ProfilCorePeriph

  • public class ProfilCorePeriph
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Profiling Core-periphery network structure by random walkers. http://www.nature.com/srep/2013/130319/srep01467/full/srep01467.html Scientific Reports 3, Article number: 1467 doi:10.1038/srep01467 Received 07 January 2013 Accepted 19 February 2013 - Published 19 March 2013
    Since:
    08/09/2014
    Author:
    MSC Student ID: 1402590 axm1064
    See Also:
    Profiling core-periphery network structure by random walkers, Rossa, Dercole, Piccardi, 02/2013

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProfilCorePeriph

        public ProfilCorePeriph(java.lang.String strInput,
                int nbrPromNodes)
        Constructor with two parameters or arguments
        Parameters:
        strInput - String type. The data received from the client/user. Network Graph data input in String format JSON.
        nbrPromNodes - of the integer type. For future use. If the user want to select the n best prominent nodes. For now the server sends the whole profile to the user.

    • Method Detail

      • printSortedNodes

        public void printSortedNodes()
        the method printSortedNodes simply prints to the console all the nodes ordered with their rank, Profiling Core-periphery profile, and Strength.

      • runProfilCorePeriph

        public void runProfilCorePeriph()
        The runProfilCorePeriph method implements the Profiling core-network structure algorithm. The algorithm may have some randomicity (in the initial node and when, at step k, many node with the same strength attain the same CPC . CPC: Core Periphery Profile coefficient

      • pcpToJson

        public java.lang.String pcpToJson()
        The method pcpToJson construct the JSON String text object to send through the network to the usr.
        Returns:
        String the JSON object to send back to the user.
